Greetings to President of Cape Verde
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Cape Verde 
    Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Pedro Pires upon his election as President of Cape Verde on March 15.
 Extending warm congratulations to the President of Cape Verde, Kim in the message hoped that the  friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms. The message sincerely wished him greater success in his work for prosperity of the country.

DPRK delegations leave
articles.content:
DPRK delegations leave 
    Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Kang Sok Sung, director of the history institute of the Central Committee of the WPK, left here today by air to participate in the congress of the Funcinpec Party of Cambodia and celebrations of its foundation.
 Meanwhile, the delegation of the DPRK Foreign Ministry headed by its vice-minister Choe Su Hon left here today by air to visit Sweden, Poland, Germany and other European countries.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian delegation
    Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A gift was presented to leader Kim Jong Il by the Russian minister of Railway Transport on a visit to the DPRK.
 It was handed to premier of the DPRK cabinet Hong Song Nam by minister Nikolai Aksenenko on March 17.
